data.lyric:
[ti:By Your Side (Explicit)]
[ar:Rod Wave]
[al:By Your Side (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]By Your Side (Explicit) - Rod Wave
[00:00.13]Composed by：Rodarius Green/Thomas Horton/Ryan Hartlove
[00:00.27]Pipe that s**t up Tnt
[00:00.92]
[00:11.41]Where the f**k is Rod Wave
[00:12.14]
[00:28.90]Hey
[00:29.12]
[00:34.70]It's November where the f**k is Rod Wave
[00:36.45]
[00:37.38]Young n***a way outta state
[00:38.61]
[00:39.51]F**ked up gettin' over pain
[00:41.54]Look how far a n***a came
[00:42.49]
[00:43.08]You remember I ain't had a thing
[00:44.85]
[00:45.56]F**ked up walkin' through the rain
[00:47.62]At the top of the game should've seen the n***as I was tryna bring
[00:51.34]It's crazy the way these n***as change
[00:53.60]Tell the city girl chill you know baby mama know the deal
[00:56.97]
[00:57.54]She know I could beat that p***y
[00:59.17]
[01:00.57]Okay let's switch the subject
[01:01.84]Notice that both of my wrists is flooded
[01:03.26]I been grindin' so hard gettin' to this money
[01:04.82]I been working like I know the drought is coming
[01:06.37]Monday to Monday Sunday to Sunday you know I'm street running
[01:12.34]Okay my daddy was a gangster what the f**k that made me
[01:15.59]N***as claiming that it's love dawg but it can't be
[01:18.63]Know I fell in love with guns by the age of thirteen
[01:21.56]And my pocket rocket on me homie don't reach
[01:24.70]F**k dying in my Cuban link I'm living in my Richard Millie
[01:28.62]I just finished my tour what a wonderful feeling
[01:31.14]
[01:31.65]I got inside my bag and got out my feelings
[01:34.55]I'm out my feelings
[01:37.41]Hey there everybody what's it like in your city
[01:42.39]I'm a thousand miles away but look tonight you look so pretty
[01:48.49]Yes you do oh
[01:50.81]
[01:52.79]Times Square couldn't shine as bright as you
[01:57.35]I swear it's true
[02:00.31]Look look
[02:01.25]
[02:01.76]Hey there everybody don't you worry about the distance
[02:06.77]I'm right here if you get lonely
[02:10.01]Give this song another listen close your eyes
[02:16.11]Uh listen to my voice it's my disguise
[02:21.31]
[02:21.86]By your your side
[02:28.60]By by your side
[02:37.21]By your side yeah yeah
[02:43.25]Watching you close
data.trans:
[ti:By Your Side (Explicit)]
[ar:Rod Wave]
[al:By Your Side (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.13]//
[00:00.27]TnTXD制作
[00:00.92]
[00:11.41]Rod Wave在哪里
[00:12.14]
[00:28.90]//
[00:29.12]
[00:34.70]十一月到了 Rod Wave在哪里
[00:36.45]
[00:37.38]年轻人背井离乡
[00:38.61]
[00:39.51]历经磨难 挺过了伤痛
[00:41.54]看看一个人能够达成多么远大的目标
[00:42.49]
[00:43.08]你记得我曾经一无所有
[00:44.85]
[00:45.56]历经磨难 走过了风风雨雨
[00:47.62]成为了游戏的霸主 应该能够站在顶峰 俯瞰我曾经帮扶过的那些家伙
[00:51.34]真是疯狂 这些人眨眼就能背叛我
[00:53.60]让这都市女孩放轻松 你知道我的小宝贝知道该怎么做
[00:56.97]
[00:57.54]她知道我能带给她快乐
[00:59.17]
[01:00.57]行吧 让我们换个话题
[01:01.84]注意到我两个手腕都闪闪发光
[01:03.26]我努力工作 赚到了这么多钱
[01:04.82]我一直不辞辛劳地工作 好像知道未来会有苦难
[01:06.37]从周一到下个周一 从周日到下个周日 你知道我统领街头
[01:12.34]我父亲曾是黑帮成员 是他把我教导成了这样
[01:15.59]那些家伙说那是出于爱 伙计 不可能
[01:18.63]要知道我十三岁的时候就爱上了枪
[01:21.56]我的钱包一点点鼓起 我到达的高度这兄弟无法企及
[01:24.70]我死也要戴着我的大金链子死 我手上随时戴着Richard Millie手表
[01:28.62]我刚刚结束了我的巡演 感觉多么美妙
[01:31.14]
[01:31.65]我往包里装钱 我宣泄我的情感
[01:34.55]我宣泄我的情感
[01:37.41]嘿 大家好 你们的城市怎么样
[01:42.39]我离你数千公里 但是看呀 今晚你这样美丽
[01:48.49]是的 你这样美丽
[01:50.81]
[01:52.79]时代广场也没有你光彩照人
[01:57.35]我发誓我说的是真的
[02:00.31]看呀 看呀
[02:01.25]
[02:01.76]嘿 各位 不用担心我们之间距离多远
[02:06.77]你孤独的时候我就陪你的身边
[02:10.01]再听一遍这首歌 闭上眼睛
[02:16.11]听我的声音 这是我的伪装
[02:21.31]
[02:21.86]在你的身边
[02:28.60]在你的身边
[02:37.21]在你的身边
[02:43.25]看着你靠近
